Name: Obsidian Barrier
Desc:
[Enchant Force]
Protects yourself and your party members by amplifying the power of the Relic.
Party member with the power of protection deals increased Critical Damage against enemies with the Ancient Curse Debuff.
Obsidian Barrier doesn't affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Discharge Enhancement
Gives your party members a personal shield.
Blast Enhancement
Increases the shield size.
Transition Enhancement
Enables re-installation of the shield.
